food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A favorite snack of primates
💛 My color is like the sun
🌱 I grow on trees in bunches

food.question: I am round and red (sometimes green!) and I grow on trees. Doctors say eating me keeps them away! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I hang from branches
⚕️ An old saying mentions me and doctors
🥧 You can bake me into a pie!

food.question: I am white, cold, and sweet. I come in many flavors and you eat me with a spoon! What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You keep me in the freezer
🥄 I'm delicious in a bowl or cone
🍨 A perfect treat on a hot day

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. You can eat me raw or cooked! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack
👁️ Good for your eyesight
🌱 I grow in the ground

food.question: I am made from milk, but I'm not liquid. I can be hard or soft, and I taste great on pizza! What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I start with milk
🍕 I melt when heated
🐭 Mice are often seen eating me in cartoons

food.question: I am small, round, and green. I grow in pods, and many people don't like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a shell
🫛 Sometimes eaten with meat or rice
😠 Often pushed around on a plate

food.question: I am made from grains, baked in an oven, and often eaten with butter or jam. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I'm often sliced
🍞 I am a staple food in many cultures
🥪 You can make sandwiches with me

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. I'm often eaten with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have tiny black seeds
🌎 I grow in warm climates
🥄 Sometimes added to smoothies

food.question: I am a type of bean that is often made into a spread or dip. I'm a good source of protein. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am used to make Hummus
🥪 Popular as a healthy snack
💪 Good source of protein

food.question: I am a drink made from roasted beans. Many adults drink me in the morning to wake up. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I am served hot most of the time
🌍 I can be found all over the world
😴 People like to drink me to get more energy

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold and fun to play in. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when you play with me.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. I help plants grow and keep you dry. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear during the day.
🔥 I give off light and heat.
🕶️ You might need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I come from the sky, and I make things wet. You need an umbrella to stay dry from me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am water falling from the sky.
☔ I make puddles.
🌱 I help plants grow.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees, and I can be gentle or strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I am air in motion.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🍃 I can rustle leaves.

weather.question: I am white and puffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
🌧️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I rumble and flash and can be very loud. I come with storms. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I am a form of electricity.
⚡ I light up the sky.
⛈️ I often come with thunder.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after the rain. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am a semi-circle of light.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am tiny balls of ice that fall from the sky. I can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain.
🤕 I can make a bump on your head.
⚾ I can be small or large.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around. I form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an 'eye' in the center.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌊 I can bring heavy rain and flooding.

weather.question: I am a rotating column of air, reaching from a thunderstorm to the ground. I look like a dark funnel. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am very dangerous.
💨 I have very strong winds.
🐄 You should take cover if you see me!
